login.description: Please enter your account and password to log in to the system
login.errorEmptyFields: Please enter your username and password
login.errorInvalidCredentials: Login failed, please check username and password
login.authDisabled: Authentication is disabled. Using login free mode.

clearDocuments.title: Clear Documents
clearDocuments.description: This will remove all documents from the system
clearDocuments.warning: WARNING: This action will permanently delete all documents and cannot be undone!
clearDocuments.confirm: Do you really want to clear all documents?

deleteDocuments.title: Delete Documents
deleteDocuments.description: This will permanently delete the selected documents from the system
deleteDocuments.warning: WARNING: This action will permanently delete the selected documents and cannot be undone!
deleteDocuments.confirm: Do you really want to delete {{count}} selected document(s)?
deleteDocuments.deleteFileTooltip: Check this option to also delete the corresponding uploaded files on the server
deleteDocuments.busy: Pipeline is busy, please try again later
deleteDocuments.notAllowed: No permission to perform this operation
deleteDocuments.cannotDeleteAll: Cannot delete all documents. If you need to delete all documents, please use the Clear Documents feature.

deselectDocuments.title: Deselect Documents
deselectDocuments.description: This will clear all selected documents ({{count}} selected)

uploadDocuments.title: Upload Documents
uploadDocuments.description: Drag and drop your documents here or click to browse.
uploadDocuments.fileTypes: Supported types: TXT, MD, DOCX, PDF, PPTX, RTF, ODT, EPUB, HTML, HTM, TEX, JSON, XML, YAML, YML, CSV, LOG, CONF, INI, PROPERTIES, SQL, BAT, SH, C, CPP, PY, JAVA, JS, TS, SWIFT, GO, RB, PHP, CSS, SCSS, LESS

fileUploader.singleFileLimit: Cannot upload more than 1 file at a time
fileUploader.fileTooLarge: File too large, maximum size is {{maxSize}}
fileUploader.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop files here, or click to select files
fileUploader.uploadDescription: You can upload {{isMultiple ? 'multiple' : count}} files (up to {{maxSize}} each)
fileUploader.duplicateFile: File name already exists in server cache

documentManager.title: Document Management
documentManager.uploadedDescription: List of uploaded documents and their statuses.
documentManager.emptyDescription: There are no uploaded documents yet.

graphPanel.dataIsTruncated: Graph data is truncated to Max Nodes

statusDialog.title: LightRAG Server Settings
statusDialog.description: View current system status and connection information

propertiesView.editPropertyDescription: Edit the property value in the text area below.

node.title: Node
node.deleteAllNodesError: Refuse to delete all nodes in the graph

chatMessage.copyError: Failed to copy text to clipboard

retrieval.startPrompt: Start a retrieval by typing your query below
retrieval.queryModeError: Only supports the following query modes: {{modes}}
retrieval.queryModePrefixInvalid: Invalid query mode prefix. Use: /<mode> [space] your query

querySettings.queryModeTooltip:
Select the retrieval strategy:
• Naive: Basic search without advanced techniques
• Local: Context-dependent information retrieval
• Global: Utilizes global knowledge base
• Hybrid: Combines local and global retrieval
• Mix: Integrates knowledge graph with vector retrieval
• Bypass: Passes query directly to LLM without retrieval
querySettings.responseFormatTooltip:
Defines the response format. Examples:
• Multiple Paragraphs
• Single Paragraph
• Bullet Points
querySettings.topKTooltip: Number of top items to retrieve. Represents entities in 'local' mode and relationships in 'global' mode
querySettings.maxTokensTextUnitTooltip: Maximum number of tokens allowed for each retrieved text chunk
querySettings.maxTokensGlobalContextTooltip: Maximum number of tokens allocated for relationship descriptions in global retrieval
querySettings.maxTokensLocalContextTooltip: Maximum number of tokens allocated for entity descriptions in local retrieval
querySettings.historyTurnsTooltip: Number of complete conversation turns (user-assistant pairs) to consider in the response context
querySettings.onlyNeedContextTooltip: If True, only returns the retrieved context without generating a response
querySettings.onlyNeedPromptTooltip: If True, only returns the generated prompt without producing a response
querySettings.streamResponseTooltip: If True, enables streaming output for real-time responses
querySettings.userPromptTooltip: Provide additional response requirements to the LLM (unrelated to query content, only for output processing).

apiKeyAlert.title: API Key is required
apiKeyAlert.description: Please enter your API key to access the service

graph.title: Graph Management
graph.createDescription: Create a new knowledge graph with a unique name and description.
graph.name: Graph Name
graph.noGraphsDescription: Create your first knowledge graph to get started.
graph.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this graph? This action cannot be undone.

node.title: Node Management
node.description: Manually create, search, and manage nodes in the knowledge graph
node.createDescription: Add a new node to the knowledge graph.
node.batchCreateDescription: Create multiple nodes at once. Format: Name|Type|Description (one per line)
node.searchDescription: Search for a node by its name to view details.
node.name: Node Name
node.searchNameRequired: Node name is required for search
node.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this node? This will also delete all related relationships.
node.feature1: Create individual nodes with custom properties
node.feature2: Batch create multiple nodes from text
node.singleCreateDesc: Use the "Create Node" button to add individual nodes with detailed information.
node.batchCreateDesc: Use the "Batch Create" button to add multiple nodes. Format: Name|Type|Description (one per line).
node.searchDesc: Use the "Search Node" button to find and manage existing nodes.

relation.title: Relation Management
relation.description: Manually create, update, and manage relationships between entities
relation.createDescription: Create a new relationship between two entities.
relation.batchCreateDescription: Create multiple relations at once. Format: Source|Target|Description|Keywords|Weight (one per line)
relation.updateDescription: Update the properties of an existing relationship.
relation.deleteDescription: Delete a relationship between two entities.
relation.entitiesRequired: Source and target entities are required
relation.createDesc: Create individual relationships with detailed properties including description, keywords, and weight.
relation.batchCreateDesc: Create multiple relationships at once using the format: Source|Target|Description|Keywords|Weight.
relation.updateDesc: Modify existing relationship properties by specifying the source and target entities.
relation.deleteDesc: Remove relationships by specifying the source and target entities.
